translations: 患孤独症的，患自闭症的

sentences.sentence: This was also found in high-functioning men with some autistic spectrum symptoms, who may tend to avoid eye contact.
sentences.translation: 在一些高功能自闭症症状的男性中也发现了这一特点，他们可能倾向于避免眼神接触。

sentences.sentence: Autistic spectrum disorders often result in major difficulties in comprehending verbal information and speech processing.
sentences.translation: 自闭症常常导致人们在理解言语信息和言语处理方面存在重大困难。

sentences.sentence: This is difficult to scientifically quantify as such extra-sensory stimuli vary greatly from one autistic individual to another.
sentences.translation: 这很难用科学的方法来量化，因为这种超感官刺激在自闭症患者之间差异很大。
